mapper.select: SELECT id, name, codeversion, updatetime, svn, searchname, person, attachment FROM ztt_codeversion WHERE 1=1
SELECT id, name, codeversion, updatetime, svn, searchname, person, attachment FROM ztt_codeversion WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ztt_codeversion ( id, name, codeversion, updatetime, svn, searchname, person ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{codeversion}, #{updatetime}, #{svn}, #{searchname}, #{person} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ztt_codeversion SET name = #{name}, codeversion = #{codeversion}, updatetime = #{updatetime}, svn = #{svn}, searchname = #{searchname}, person = #{person}, attachment = #{attachment} WHERE id=#{id}

UPDATE ztt_codeversion
name = #{name},
codeversion = #{codeversion},
updatetime = #{updatetime},
svn = #{svn},
searchname = #{searchname},
person = #{person},
attachment = #{attachment},
WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM ztt_codeversion WHERE id IN
#{item}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ztt_codeversion ( id, name, codeversion, updatetime, svn, searchname, person ) VALUES
( #{item.id}, #{item.name}, #{item.codeversion}, #{item.updatetime}, #{item.svn}, #{item.searchname}, #{item.person} )

update.foreach: UPDATE ztt_codeversion SET name = #{item.name}, codeversion = #{item.codeversion}, updatetime = #{item.updatetime}, svn = #{item.svn}, searchname = #{item.searchname}, person = #{item.person} WHERE id=#{item.id}

UPDATE ztt_codeversion
name = #{item.name},
codeversion = #{item.codeversion},
updatetime = #{item.updatetime},
svn = #{item.svn},
searchname = #{item.searchname},
person = #{item.person},
WHERE id=#{item.id}
